data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 858 believers in the state of Berat.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Berat, Albania
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Berat, Albania to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Berat, Albania to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Berat, Albania to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Turk people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Berat, Albania today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 141,900 people living in the state of Berat.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Berat.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
